definition: as easy as blowing off dust/effortless/with ease
pinyin: bu4 fei4 chui1 hui1 zhi1 li4

definition: to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through

sentences.english: They romped through their entrance examinations.
sentences.chinese: 他們不費吹灰之力就通過了入學測驗。

sentences.english: So yeah, she probably won't break a sweat playing an enchanted wardrobe.
sentences.chinese: 所以呢，她演一個魔性衣櫃大概不費吹灰之力吧。

sentences.english: Jones simply walked over at billiards .
sentences.chinese: 在彈子戲中，瓊斯不費吹灰之力贏了。

sentences.english: i got this sort of comfortable soft shorts with no efforts.
sentences.chinese: 我不費吹灰之力弄到了這種綿軟舒適的褲衩。

sentences.english: Indeed, Buffett can win the game before ever stepping up to bat.
sentences.chinese: 的確，巴菲特不費吹灰之力就能在交易中大獲全勝。

sentences.english: Transferring cine film or slides to video should be a doddle.
sentences.chinese: 把電影膠片或幻燈片轉換成視頻應該不費吹灰之力。

sentences.english: Thus Yan Ying was able to remove three potential threats to the country of Qi without lifting a finger.
sentences.chinese: 於是晏嬰不費吹灰之力就剷除了齊國的三個隱患。

sentences.english: Overstimulation of the reward circuitry in the brain is a very real possibility today.
sentences.chinese: 過度刺激大腦中的快感鏈路在今天真是不費吹灰之力。

sentences.english: He seemed to turn naturally to novel-writing.
sentences.chinese: 他寫小說好像不費吹灰之力。

sentences.english: Fly-fishing might look easy, but it's not.
sentences.chinese: 用毛鉤釣魚也許看起來不費吹灰之力，其實並非如此。

definition: lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: lit. four ounces can move a thousand catties (idiom)/fig. to achieve much with little effort
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
